description: ISO 8823 OSI Presentation Protocol implementation for IEC 61850, based on libIEC61850 C library

NewPresentation.description: Creates a new presentation with default parameters (acseContextId=1, mmsContextId=3, selectors=[0,0,0,1])

BuildCPType.description: Creates CP-type (Connect Presentation) PDU based on IsoPresentation_createConnectPdu from C library. Uses default presentation parameters.

encodeUserData.signature: encodeUserData(presentation *Presentation, userData []byte, buf []byte, bufPos int, encode bool) int
encodeUserData.description: Encodes user data (private function, corresponds to encodeUserData from C library)

createConnectPdu.description: Creates CP-type PDU using specified presentation (private function, corresponds to createConnectPdu from C library)
